channel.title: Co-founder on Dipankar Sarkar
channel.description: Recent content in Co-founder on Dipankar Sarkar

item.title: Startups
item.description: Dipankar Sarkar has a history of launching and advising tech start-ups, with expertise in blockchain, machine learning, microblogging, and more.
A seasoned technologist and entrepreneur, I bring extensive experience in cutting-edge fields including blockchain, machine learning, and web-scale architecture.
